name: TimeShift (itch) (SpartG)
description:
Move : WASD or ZQSD or ↑←↓→
Jump : Space Bare
Pickup : Left Mouse 
Swap time : Right Mouse

Bug knows (current version) :
-In some context, when the player pickup, the character gets to fly
-In some context, the player can pick a object that it should not be able to pickup

CREDITS :

  • SpartG - Dev, Game Design, UI and 3D graphics
  • Music used: "Troubling Mischief!" by HeatleyBros
